chapters.title: Chapter 11:  Lessons and Teachers
chapters.info: Henre Haslin, p. 214 (294)—Former Master of the Sword for the Queen's Guards in Caemlyn. He was too old for campaigning, so Gaebril handed him his pension and showed him the gate to get him out of the way. When news of Morgase's death, he started drinking. He believes that Gaebril killed her, and is willing to teach Rand's students.
